item.title: Wednesday Briefing: China’s Economy Grows Despite Tariffs
item.description: Plus, “Severance” picks up top Emmy nominations.

item.title: Men Who Cut Down Beloved Tree in England Get More Than 4 Years in Prison
item.description: The tree, a landmark that stood by Hadrian’s Wall in northern England, was found illegally cut down in 2023.

item.title: Ukraine Will Get U.S. Weapons in a New Way. Here’s What We Know.
item.description: NATO allies will buy arms, then give them to Ukraine, President Trump said.
